meanings.definition: A glossy finish applied to fabric or paper.
meanings.sent1: The cire on the fabric made it shine beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The artist used cire to add a glossy touch to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The cire on the paper made it look like a shiny mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reflected in the cire of the fabric, creating a radiant glow.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the cire, making it sparkle like diamonds.

meanings.definition: To give a glossy finish to fabric or paper.
meanings.sent1: She decided to cire the fabric to make it look more elegant.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman carefully cired the paper to achieve a glossy effect.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally cired the wrong side of the fabric, creating a shiny surprise.
meanings.sent4: The artist's hands seemed to cire the paper with magic, transforming it into a glossy masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The cired fabric caught the light in a way that mesmerized everyone who saw it.
